title: The Boards are displaying Weird for Me
body:
From some weeks now I have lost 2 functionalities from the boards:

1.-I can no longer find the "Red tracker" button on the left side of threads and have to manually look for Rioters posts in the threads

2.-All messages appear as individuals, and can't see what messages people are responding to (For example I will see a message that says "yes, you are right" but not the "parent" message the reply is referring to.

I have tried using Google Chrome and Firefox with the same results, as well as logging out and back in several times

replies.body:
Hey there, this thread was originally deleted for being in the wrong boards but I may have some answers for you!  It sounds like you might be swapping between chronological and discussion view.  Switching to discussion should show the correct branches and not like individual replies.

I'm not seeing any issues with the red tracker, but we have been messing around with it a bit to block posts on H&S.  Is that still an issue?
